name: saucenao
title: SauceNAO - Reverse Image Search
description: Reverse image search using SauceNAO APIs.
author: BrandonGiesing

commands.name: reverse-image-search-with-clipboard
commands.title: Reverse Search Clipboard
commands.description:
Sends your most recent clipboard entry to the SauceNAO API.

If it finds a URL, it will use it directly.

If it finds an image, it will use a temporary upload to File.io that becomes deleted immediately upon retrieval

commands.name: reverse-image-search-with-url
commands.title: Reverse Search URL
commands.description: Reverse Image Search using a provided URL

commands.name: reverse-image-search-selected-file
commands.title: Reverse Search Selected Finder Image
commands.description: Uploads the selected image in Finder to File.io to reverse image search with SauceNAO

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
